Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Relates to extending the expiration of provisions authorizing the county of Cattaraugus to impose an additional one percent sales and compensating use taxes
Summary: Extends the expiration of provisions authorizing the county of Cattaraugus to impose an additional one percent sales and compensating use taxes to November 30th, 2023.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to extending the expiration of provisions authorizing the county of Cattaraugus to impose an additional one percent sales and compensating use taxes
